articles.description: After Emma Raducanu plays one of her best matches in "a long time", BBC Sport analyses how she can test world number one Aryna Sabalenka.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Emma Raducanu ready for world number one Aryna Sabalenka after 'statement' win

articles.description: Switzerland head coach Pia Sundhage urged her players seize "once in a lifetime moment", but did they handle the pressure?
articles.title: Women's Euro 2025: Hosts Switzerland fall at first hurdle but hope Euro 2025 can spark change

articles.description: Why India captain Shubman Gill's innings was so special, how he repelled England's tactic of bowling straight and the legends he has bettered.
articles.title: Shubman Gill: India captain's century the most controlled on record as tourists defy England

articles.description: Former world heavyweight champion Tyson Fury will come out of retirement in 2026, Saudi boxing power broker Turki Alalshikh hints.
articles.title: Tyson Fury could fight in 2026, Saudi boxing supremo Turki Alalshikh hints

articles.description: The talking points after the British and Irish Lions' 52-12 victory over Queensland Reds, as Tom English attempts to pick his Test squad.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025: Daly blow, Itoje's reminder and Test team taking shape

articles.description: British university student Ollie Tarvet is unable to create one of the biggest shocks in Wimbledon history against two-time champion Carlos Alcaraz.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Ollie Tarvet's dream run comes to an end against Carlos Alcaraz

articles.description: World number one Aryna Sabalenka continues her pursuit of a maiden Wimbledon title with a hard-fought victory over Czech player Marie Bouzkova.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Aryna Sabalenka continues maiden SW19 title pursuit with win over Marie Bouzkova

articles.description: Wimbledon is all about moments and while Katie Boulter is left wondering whether hers will ever come, fellow Briton Sonay Kartal is grasping hers.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Katie Boulter and Sonay Kartal's contrasting fortunes

articles.description: Everton are closer to reaching an agreement with Villarreal over signing France Under-21s striker Thierno Barry.
